page.title: 11SPORTS AND RECREATION
page.content: AT PATTERDALE SCHOOL WE DO A LOT OF SPORT WE PLAY ROUNDERS AND SKITTLE BALL. AT PATTERDALE PLAYING FIELD PEOPLE COME TO SPORTS AT THE END OF JUNE. ONE OF THE MOST POPULAR SPORTS IN OUR AREA IS FELL RUNNING . SOME NIGHTS THE BOYS GO TO CRICKET PRACTICE. AT SCHOOL THE CHILDREN LIKE DOING GYM . ANOTHER POPULAR ASPECT OF RECREATION IS HOUND TRAILING. THIS HAS A STRONG LOCAL TRADITION DATING BACK MANY YEARS. THE AREA IS VERY GOOD FOR ROCK CLIMBING BECAUSE THE MOUNTAINS HAVE MANY STEEP CLIFF FACES AND ROCK OUTCROPS. MANY PEOPLE COME TO THE GLENRIDDING AREA TO TAKE UP FELL WALKING AS THE HELVELLYN RANGE OF MOUNTAINS ARE LESS THAN 2 TO 3 MILES AWAY.
